page.title: T-W, Comcast in Pact on Cable Unit Stake
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Time Warner Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=TWX.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">TWX.N</A> and Comcast Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CMCSA.OQ target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CMCSA.OQ</A> said on Monday they had agreed to a pact giving Comcast an option to cut its interest in Time Warner Cable Inc. in exchange for stock in a Time Warner subsidiary that will hold cable systems and cash.
